document.full_text: medical device maker boston scientific corp said it has recalled more than 29,000 of its icross coronary imaging catheters after receiving reports of the catheter tip detaching during procedures.
document.title: boston scientific recalls catheters
lines_and_colors: medical device maker boston scientific corp said it has recalled more than 29,000 of its icross coronary imaging catheters after receiving reports of the catheter tip detaching during procedures.
